name: 藝術大師小故事
syllabus:
This course will cover a selection of artist stories that those studying the arts should know. This list includes painters, sculptors, illustrators, etc. A brief synopsis and notes will be provided at the beginning of class as prompts for discussion. These stories will be used to engage conversations and as a source of inspiration.

本課程挑選學習藝術應該知道的知名藝術家相關的故事，包括畫家、雕塑家、插畫家….。每一堂課會提供課程內容摘要及相關討論議題。以藝術大師小故事作為討論的開端、可成為啟發創作靈感的元素。(英文正版影片和英文字幕)
